name: Stag Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Classic Woods.Key Notes:Seductive Agarwood, Magnetic Palo Santo, Alluring Leather.Fragrance Description:Stag Eau de Parfum is a rich, woody perfume featuring notes of seductive agarwood, magnetic Palo Santo, and alluring leather that evokes the scent of innate confidence..About the Bottle:Inspired by an antique ink flask, the bottle is sensuous, smooth, and comfortable to hold, with fluted glass panels. Ribbed glass is a signature look seen throughout The Maker Hotel, from fragrance and candles, glassware, and lighting fixtures. Made with post-consumer-recycled glass, The Maker uses 27 percent less glass than traditional perfume bottles and C02-free production methods..About the Fragrance:Inspired by innate confidence.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (parfum), Water (eau), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Citronellol, Eugenol, Farnesol, Hydroxycitronellal Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool.  .....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of many in the Maker line that I am drawn into. I have sampled them all and overall Lover is my absolute favorite, but Stag has me smelling myself over and over. Its top notes are of a Smokey woody warmth scent that will dissipate into a softer and welcoming skin scent. Itu2019s COZY and nostalgic for me because it reminds me of a deodorant my mom would use (soft and dry) but in a very very good way. It makes you want to snuggle in, like a soft warm blanket from the dryer in winter. Itu2019s beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really love the scent but Iu2019m disappointed. Yes I understand I ordered the smaller size- but it is very, VERY tiny for $57. Also the bottle wasnu2019t even full and looked like some was missing. Very racket if you ask me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow wow wow. Thereu2019s something nostalgic and familiar about this fragrance.  Woody and definitely heavy but not to the point of being overbearing. To be frank, I originally thought Iu2019d prefer u201cFireu201d by the maker, but Stag takes the cake. Itu2019s sophisticated and unique. Definitely a statement!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stag opens with a bold declaration of smoky leather, immediately drawing you into its enchanting realm. As the journey progresses, a mesmerizing blend of woods emerges, captivating the senses with its hypnotic allure. What truly sets Stag apart is its intoxicating agarwood note, lingering gracefully into the dry down, leaving a lasting impression that defies time itself. Remarkably, its wear time extends well beyond 14 hours, a testament to its enduring quality. Surprisingly, despite initial skepticism based on its notes, Stag emerges as a perfect 10, a fragrance I would wholeheartedly gift to a significant other. In every essence, Stag is not just a scent, but an unforgettable experience. These are my honest thoughts as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was hopeful that this perfume would smell amazing. Ughhhh. It smells like a really bad drugstore perfume.  It's  strong & musty. I should have sprayed a small amount outside, but I sprayed it on my arm. I had to wash it off because it ended up making me feel sick because of the scent. It's especially disappointing because of the price point. I don't recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely more of a cold weather perfume, though Iu2019ll definitely still try this in the warmer months. Itu2019s a perfect blend if warm, sweet from the leather, and a little spicy. I wear this around the house and even to bed. I get that the unisex thing isnu2019t for everyone, but this is incredibly sexy if thatu2019s more youu2019re thing.
